name: actor-competitive-intelligence-orchestrator
title: Competitive Intelligence Orchestrator
description: Reads actor run configurations from Supabase, starts runs in parallel on Apify, waits for completion, and stores results back to Supabase.

PUBLIC_SUPABASE_PUBLISHABLE_DEFAULT_KEY.title: Supabase Publishable Key
PUBLIC_SUPABASE_PUBLISHABLE_DEFAULT_KEY.description: Supabase publishable default key for authentication

SUPABASE_MANAGEMENT_ACCESS_TOKEN.title: Supabase Management Access Token
SUPABASE_MANAGEMENT_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Personal access token for Supabase Management API (used to create tables)
